io.micronaut.security.token.jwt.signature.ec

Class ECSignature

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.security.token.jwt.signature.AbstractSignatureConfiguration
      • io.micronaut.security.token.jwt.signature.ec.ECSignature
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SignatureConfiguration
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ECSignatureGenerator

    public class ECSignature
extends AbstractSignatureConfiguration
    Elliptic curve signature. Adds method to verify signed JWT.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Sergio del Amo
    See Also:
    JSON Web Token (JWT) with EC signature
